title: Diary of Steve the Noob 9
description: This Minecraft diary is over 9,000 words long with 16 pictures to accompany the story.Finally, Steve makes it home. After a crazy adventure, he has gathered all the necessary ingredients to make the cure for Cindy. Steve is super excited to make the golden apple, but first, he has to visit an old friend...Find out what happens next by reading this diary today. There is a question at the end of this book. Let me know your thoughts, thanks! Disclaimer: This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights.
